sub_fields.label: Hero image URL
sub_fields.name: hero_image_url
sub_fields.instructions: If this field is filled out it will override the Hero image destination field

sub_fields.label: Number of Items
sub_fields.name: collection_post_limit
sub_fields.instructions: Limits the number of items returned

sub_fields.label: Show Videos in Popup
sub_fields.name: module_modal_video
sub_fields.instructions: Displays resident video in a popup window On Click.

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text to display as a button in module
